content.raw: The `PagingPath` is `static`, so it's shared across instances of the `HeightMap` class.  But the contents of that directory are removed in the [constructor](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/687/terrain-paging-support-for-rendering/diff#Lgazebo/rendering/Heightmap.ccT56) and [destructor](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/687/terrain-paging-support-for-rendering/diff#Lgazebo/rendering/Heightmap.ccT76), which will be called for each `HeightMap` instance.  Is that safe to do?  Can there be more than one `HeightMap` instance?
content.html: The PagingPath is static, so it's shared across instances of the HeightMap class. But the contents of that directory are removed in the constructor and destructor, which will be called for each HeightMap instance. Is that safe to do? Can there be more than one HeightMap instance?
